main.name: Daun Joung
main.description: Client-side developer, especially iOS and Android application development. I believe not the all developers change the world, but can change the near me.
main.bio: Programming skills and foreign language study, I believe I can have various experiences if I have two skills. By developing applications for mobile devices, can solve the problem near us and listen to various people's thoughts. In addition, by studying human languages, it gives me more chance to communicate with others. To experience the world more, I'm keep studying.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bachelor's degree of Computer Science and Information Engineering
education.description: Inha University is in Incheon, South Korea, known traditionally for research and education in the engineering and physical sciences. The department of Computer Science and Information Engineering (shortly, CSE) has course like Object-oriented programming, Asembly-language, Databases, Complier, Network programming, Computer graphics and etc.

ISEP is a French grandes écoles located in Paris, France. It specializes in electronics, telecommunication and computer science. During the exchange student period, in Software Engineer track of graduate level, studied Advaced Algorithmics, Languages and Compilation, Security, and Formar Approaches.

T Academy is free education institution of SK Planet, the subsidiary of SK Telecom, development O2O Commerce platfrom and digital content business. Course is consist of 8 week curriculum, including basis Objective-C language education, iOS Application development knowledge, and project with Planner, Designer, Mobile Application Developer (Android, iOS) and Backend programmer. The development outcome is 300 Bowling application.

work.title: Senior UX God
work.description: 분할 : split-off  // 하이브란 무엇인지에 대한 것과 간단한 기능들에 대한 설명이 적혀있어야 할 듯 하다. HIVE SDK v1, v4 둘다 개발하고 있고 유니티 플러그인도 개발하고 있음. // 문의 대응도 하고 있음 // 신규 피쳐 개발 및 버그 수정 등을 하고 있고 짬짬히 iOS 신 기능에 대한 리서치도 하고 있음

work.title: Junior bug fixer
work.description: 플랫폼개발팀은 컴투스와 게임빌이 공통으로 사용하는 플러그인을 개발하는 곳임. HIVE SDK v1 유지보수 및 개발 진행 // 문의 대응 진행 // 유니티 도 공부함 // objc 기반으로 공부하고 잇음

work.title: Internship
work.description: Team OCB Development. 인턴십 진행함. OCB Manage 하는 관리 사이트를 개발하였다. 일 만건 이상의 데이터를 분석해서 도표화 하는 시스템. Spring framework를 사용하였음.

work.title: Application Developer
work.description: http://teamnexters.com/ 앱 개발에 관심있는 기획자 / 디자이너 / 개발자가 모여서 활동하는 동아리. 2기 개발자로 약 2년간 활동하면서 1년에 2개의 프로젝트에 참여하여 활동하는 곳임.

work.company: IGRUS (Inha Group of Research Unix Security)
work.title: Application Developer
work.description: 학교 내 학과 동아리. 전반적인 보안에 대한 기초를 공부하고 다양한 세미나에 참여하고 모의 해킹 대회에 참가하였다. 리버싱 엔지니어링, 네트워크 해킹, 포렌식, 웹해킹, 암호학에 기초에 대해 공부하였으며, 이는 이후 개발자로써 살아가는데 큰 도움이 되고 있다.

projects.title: 다함께 복불복 (Cocos2d-x)

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
